website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaTab A1000 might be among the most affordable tablets available, but its entertainment focus and front-facing speakers aren't enough to make up for an otherwise below average device.
cons: Below average display with poor viewing angle

customer_reviews.title: Really great tablet. Feels very solid than many other tablets ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great tablet. Feels very solid than many other tablets on the market from that category. Screen is not the best but its ok and speakers as well on the front is a plus. The only negative is that its loosing wifi connection frequent (especially when many devices are connected to the same router) and cant find a way to fix it. It looks like a hardware problem on that model based and other reviews as well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: you're joking!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these tablets on 10.12.13. One of them 'died' mid January so we were able to send it back and got a full refund. The second tablet 'died' yesterday so it's 14 days outside the return date. My 5 year old is in pieces. We thought Lenovo was a good make and would be sturdy and robust enough for kids. When the tablets worked they were brilliant but to both break within 2 months is totally not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: SC Northants

customer_reviews.title: good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my daughter for Christmas and had to return the first, but the replacement service from Amazon was excellent, and the new tablet works fine. Very small memory, so had to add external, but has enough capacity for children.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lisa Lounds

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. I got it for my daughters Christmas last year the first time the battery died we could not charge it it's bit worked since
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Bought for stepson's Christmas present...
customer_reviews.text: ...and can't get him to put it down. Does everything he wants it to, without costing a fortune (just in case he does lose or break it!)
customer_reviews.author: Purplemunchkin

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: excellent price-quality ration.suits my needs perfectly.have easily installed all the apps i need-skype,media,banking,drop box, would recommend to anyone who wants reasonably priced tablet for general needs
customer_reviews.author: embt

customer_reviews.title: ver disappointing tab...
customer_reviews.text: this tablet is of very bad quality specialy the camera. I was not expecting this from LENOVO. could have bought a very good Chinese tab in this price.
customer_reviews.author: jawad

customer_reviews.title: never again
customer_reviews.text: Item I bought wouldn't work and couldn't get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: broke within a couple of days and had to change.
customer_reviews.author: john whittington

customer_reviews.title: excellent for the price and fab tablet.
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter and wasn't sure at such a low price but better than my nexus 7. Which cost five times the price =-O
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Functional but limited
customer_reviews.text: Pro's Cheap: I paid £80 for it. Reasonable processing power. Quality construction. Useful built in speakers. Good internal memory. Stable: no crashes experienced in a month of use. Takes microSD. Great for watching video alone. Con's Terrible bass heavy audio. Mediocre equaliser which does little to rescue the muddy bass heavy audio. Poor screen viewing angles. Poor screen resolution. Two people would not enjoy watching video. Bass heavy audio is so bad it makes me mad to think this product could reach the marketplace! I bought this as an mp3 player : (
customer_reviews.author: Rich T BixBix

customer_reviews.title: THE GREAT LENOVA A1000 TABLET
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with tablet.Easy to operate and has all the features I wanted,would recommend to anyone who wants everything at their fingertips
customer_reviews.author: Terry Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great product Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This machine price initially is what attracted me to this product . How it features such as digital Dolby through the head phones, when watching movies, amazing. When not using the headphones, stereo speakers in the front great. WIFI really good. I would recommend this product because it performs as the box's states
customer_reviews.author: Mr  Sammy Cherubin

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo A1000 7-inch Tablet (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this tablet I owned a cheaper one which gave up the ghost approx: one year after use and to be fair it performed reasonably well but there the comparison ends as this one is in a different league Its been well thought out with its features and build quality plus its a well known make but what was the deal breaker was the ability to increase the internal storage space (click on system in settings then click check for updates ) which is quite straight forward So all in all and considering the price well pleased
customer_reviews.author: johnboy

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Isn't as fancy as more expensive tablets on the market, but does the job of web surfing, music and video playback quite adequately, the battery life could do with a bit more punch but overall it's worth 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DaveTT

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed only with one thing when I was viewing the product it was indicating that there is a simcard slot but surprising after purchasing it does not have a sim slot that was my disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: jones banda

customer_reviews.title: not forme dissapoining
customer_reviews.text: no insruction and did not work on certain reqiuirmentsnot fit for purpose and was very dissapinting and was not for me
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product heading
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with Amazon. I bought this product for a client presentation, and paid extra for next morning delivery. When I turned on the tablet it was the wrong version of Android. It is android 4.1.2 not 4.2. So I could not run my demo because there is a bug in android 4.1.x, which was only fixed in android 4.2. I will never trust Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerge

product_meta.title: Lenovo A1000 7-inch Tablet (Black) - (MTK 8317 1GHz Processor, 1GB RAM, 16GB eMMC, WLAN, BT, GPS, Webcam, Android 4.2)
product_meta.description:
LENOVO A1000 TABLET
HEAVY ENTERTAINMENT FOR THOSE WHO TRAVEL LIGHT
 Get double the performance with the Lenovo A1000, which comes with Dolby Digital Plus sound and dual front-facing speakers for uncompromised audio. It’s all the entertainment you’ll ever need. Featuring a MT8317 Dual-Core Processor, it allows you to play games and multimedia at high speed. 

The Lenovo A1000 Android music tablet is a 7” portable tablet with amazing music performance enhancements, perfect for carrying around with you during the day. Its smaller size -- at 199mm wide and 10.7mm at its thickest -- makes it great for carrying around and listening to music, reading books, surfing the web or watching films in brilliant vivid color with you wherever you are during the day.

AT A GLANCE
 *  Dual Core 1.2GHz MT 8317 processor 
 *  7” display (1024x600) touchscreen with IPS wide view technology 
 *  4GB/8GB/16GB eMMC storage, expandable by 32GB with micro-SIM 
 *  1GB LP DDR2 memory 
 *  Micro-USB with On The Go (OTG) support 
 *  Front camera 
 *  Bluetooth 4.0

FUN AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
THE MUSIC MASTER
Music lovers can experience all the rich sounds and beats from the dual front-facing speakers, which are widely spaced to improve the stereo effects. Also, each speaker is more than 1cc in size, allowing you to experience louder, deeper bass.

DOLBY DIGITAL PLUS
Listening to music, films and games on your PC will never be the same. With the Dolby Digital Plus tools, you can experience riveting high-fidelity surround sound on your tablet. Dolby Digital Plus delivers high-quality sound and additional bandwidth savings – giving you great content with fewer interruptions. 

FIVE-FINGER MULTI-TOUCH DISPLAY
The Lenovo A1000 features five-finger multi-touch technology for the ability to effortlessly control apps, browse the web, and play engaging games. This innovative screen is sensitive and easy to use, making typing easier and offering a responsive gaming experience.

FRONT CAMERA
Take your web chats to the next level thanks to the built-in 0.3 MP front camera which lets you stream higher-definition images, giving you clearer picture, perfect for capturing those special moments on photo and video and sharing them with your friends.

MICROSD CARD SLOT
If you need more space for your favourite multimedia the expansion slot allows you to insert microSD memory cards into your tablet. This means you can expand your storage space and transfer files between mobile devices easily. The Lenovo A1000 also features a 3.5 mm Audio/Mic Jack port and Micro-USB (supports USB-OTG).

WI-FI AND BLUETOOTH 4.0
The Lenovo A1000 comes with multiple wireless connection options. The built-in 802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi adapter will allow you to enjoy reliable connections to the internet, whether at home or on a public network, while Bluetooth 4.0 is available to make it easier to connect and share files with other devices.

HANDY AND LIGHT 
Available in black and white and preloaded with Google Apps, you'll find the Lenovo A1000 is lighter than many of the other tablets available. This means that it is comfortable to hold and use for long periods, making it ideal for reading or watching movies. The 7" screen is large enough for easy viewing, while also being small enough to easily slip into a small bag or handbag.

OPTIMISED FOR ENTERTAINMENT
DUAL CORE PROCESSOR 
The MT8317 Dual-Core processor with 1GB LP-DDR2 memory gives great performance for games, graphics, overall system speed and applications. Also on the Lenovo A1000 you'll find up to 1 GB of fast DDR2 memory and up to 32 GB of microSD expandable storage, meaning you can access your files quickly and easily. 

GOOGLE ANDROID 4.1.2 "JELLY BEAN"
Sleek, smart and full of innovative features, the Lenovo A1000 is equipped with the highly intuitive Google Android 4.1.2 "Jelly Bean" operating system, a version of the Android platform specifically optimised for tablets. Android 4.1 features improved multi-tasking performance, more reactive touch responses, Photo Sphere, gesture typing keyboard, Google Now with more cards and a redesigned camera app. Android 4.1 also offers faster orientation changes, quicker switching between recent apps, and smoother and more consistent rendering across the system through vsync and triple buffering.

As well as featuring your favourite Google Mobile services including YouTube, Gmail, Google Maps and more, you'll also be able to access thousands of the latest apps, games and entertainment through the Google Play store.

LONG-LASTING BATTERY LIFE
The Lenovo A1000 comes equipped with a long-life li-polymer battery, so users can get the most out of their tablet between charges. With Wi-Fi connected you will be able to enjoy up to eight hours of online productivity as well as six hours of video playback before it needs to be topped up.



BOX CONTAINS
Lenovo Tablet
AC Adapter
User Documentation
feature_bullets: Fast and powerful dual core processor that won't keep you waiting
Always connected with WLAN, GPS and Bluetooth
Up to 8 hours Wi-Fi browsing and 6 hours video playback
